questions.question: How did we connect to FME Server from Workbench?
options: Workbench automatically connects to FME Server

questions.question: During this exercise, we created a repository, what is the main purpose of a repository?
options: A folder to hold workspaces and their associated content
A folder to hold workspace data
A folder to hold FME Server Web connections
A folder to hold output data

questions.question: During this exercise, we modified the writer's feature type name to this expression: FireHalls-@Value(NeighborhoodName). What did this do?
options: Writes a new table or layer for every neighborhood. Every layer contains the same data.
Appends NeighborhoodName to the destination file .
Writes a new table or layer for every neighborhood. The data for each layer will only be related to that neighborhood.
